listings.title: Getting Started
listings.description: Learn more about how to use the app.

listings.title: What is RSS
listings.description: You don't know what RSS is about and why you should use gReader? Read this.

listings.title: Themes
listings.description: Blue, Green, Sepia, Dark or Black theme. What do you prefer?

listings.title: Offline Reading
listings.description: With gReader you can have all the latest news along the way without an internet connection. The gReader app downloads for you all the news on to your android phone.

listings.title: Search Filters
listings.description: Easily search for articles and save them for later access.

listings.title: Podcast
listings.description: Discover and listen to you favorite podcasts within the app.

listings.title: Voice Reading
listings.description: Voice Reading gives you the freedom to listen to selected news of your choice

listings.title: Widgets
listings.description: Put widgets on your home screen to get quicker access. gReader offers different kind of widgets.

listings.title: Hidden Features
listings.description: There are some features that are not obviously to the users. Find out how they can help you to read your news more comfortable.
